mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_idx, member_nickname, board_title, board_date, board_type, board_time, board_pay, board_addr, board_contents) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(board_idx), 0)+1 FROM board), #{member_nickname}, #{board_title}, sysdate, #{board_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_pay}, #{board_addr}, #{board_contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_idx=#{board_idx}, member_nickname=#{member_nickname}, board_title=#{board_title}, board_date=sysdate, board_type=#{board_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, board_time=#{board_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, board_pay=#{board_pay}, board_addr=#{board_addr}, board_contents=#{board_contents} WHERE board_idx=#{board_idx}
